actions.name: Chilling Neigh

cost.trigger: The user causes at least one creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes at least one creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

Effect: The user's ATK Stage is increased by +1 for 7 Activations.

actions.name: Chilling Neigh

cost.trigger: The user possesses the effect Calyrex Rider.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user possesses the effect Calyrex Rider.

Effect: The user gains Connection - Glacial Lance and takes 33% less damage from Special-Category Attacks.

system.description:
Trigger: The user causes at least one creature to gain @Affliction[fainted]

Effect: The user's ATK Stage is increased by +1 for 5 Activations.

Passive: If the user has the effect Calyrex Rider, the user gains Connection - Glacial Lance and takes 33% less damage from Special-Category Attacks.
